main.name: Daya Lu
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer

projects.title: American Marketing Association
projects.category: Annual reports and graphics I created as Vice President of Marketing for The American Marketing Association (Nest Strategies) at JHU.

projects.title: High School
projects.category: A collection of graphics I made in high school for digital art, the school website, and the school play. A throwback!

projects.title: Chore Tracker
projects.category: Wireframes I created as a part of my User Interfaces & Mobile Applications class, in which I worked on the frontend for an Android app.

projects.title: Study Stacks
projects.category: A wireframe I created for Study Stacks, a Quizlet-like app to study flash cards.

projects.title: Mobelle
projects.category: A furniture recommendation website I worked on the front end for as part of a semester long group project for my Object Oriented Software Engineering class.

projects.title: Goba
projects.category: Graphics I made for Goba tea bottles, a startup on campus that sold bottled bubble tea.
